titleStmt.title: To his Grace, his Majesties high commissioner, and Honourable Estates of Parliament, The petition of Patrick Porterfield of Comistoun, and other heritors near adjecent to the town of Edinburgh.
titleStmt.author: Porterfield, Patrick.
Scotland. Parliament.
